task.title: Alternative Call Tutorial
task.shortdesc: This tutorial describes how to use an alternative call.

context.p: Alternating calls are a GSM and WCDMA service that allow the clients to create a call that uses two alternating bearer services. The bearers can be an alternating voice and data call or an alternating voice and fax call.

step.info: Use RMobileCall::Dial() to start an alternative call.
Use RMobileCall::SwitchAlternatingCall() to initiate a switch in the alternative call mode.
The switch is used to swap the bearers of the call.
Use RMobileCall::NotifyAlternatingCallSwitch() to get the notification of an alternative call mode switch.
The notification provides the status of the switch.
